body:
Comment 2 by **dimisec**: 
Sorry, for the first one - pkg/thml/template/html.go Line 53, the change should be:
http://www.w3.org/TR/html5/tokenization.html#attribute-value-unquoted-state =>
http://www.w3.org/TR/html5/syntax.html#attribute-value-(unquoted)-state

More of bad links that we should fix:

in pkg/html/template/attr.go http://golang.org/src/pkg/html/template/attr.go 
Line  93:
http://www.w3.org/TR/html5/Overview.html#event-handlers-on-elements-document-objects-and-window-objects
(leads to the top of the page, not the specific section in question) =>
http://www.w3.org/TR/html5/webappapis.html#event-handlers-on-elements,-document-objects,-and-window-objects

pkg/html/template/content.go http://golang.org/src/pkg/html/template/content.go Line 19
http://golang.org/src/pkg/html/template/content.go - goes to the top of the page, not
sure which section it should point to 


pkg/html/template/context.go - http://golang.org/src/pkg/html/template/context.go Line
16:

http://www.w3.org/TR/html5/the-end.html#parsing-html-fragments =>
http://www.w3.org/TR/html5/syntax.html#the-end

Line 99:
http://dev.w3.org/html5/spec/syntax.html#elements-0 =>
http://www.w3.org/TR/html5/syntax.html#elements-0

(I believe dev.w3.org does not respond - in any case, use of dev.w3.org and www.w3.org
in the same file is not consistent)

In pkg/template/html/escape.go http://golang.org/src/pkg/html/template/escape.go 
Line 667:
http://www.w3.org/TR/html5/tokenization.html#attribute-value-unquoted-state => 
http://www.w3.org/TR/html5/syntax.html#attribute-value-(unquoted)-state
